knimeNode.name: Add Homologues
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds homologues for the input data to the output table

fullDescription.intro: Reports homologues (of different types) for each gene ID specified in the input table using the Ensembl genome database.
fullDescription.option: Specify the genome identifiers provided in the input table. Only genomes provided by the ENSEMBL server are shown.
Select the column with the gene ID's to locate in the Ensembl database

ports.inPort: List of ID's representing gene names in the configured species
ports.outPort: Output table consisting of reported (putative) homologues
